text: Bevaix was a municipality in the district of Boudry in the canton of Neuchâtel in Switzerland. On 1 January 2018, the municipalities of Bevaix, Saint-Aubin- Sauges, Gorgier, Vaumarcus, Montalchez and Fresens joined together and became the new municipality of La Grande-Béroche.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 February 2018 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Neuchâtel
title: Bevaix
